title: Anxiety Management and Stress Utilization Strategies in Challenging Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic social studies concepts and basic digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: A process involving VR technology to simulate real-world social problem-solving while systematically managing learners' anxiety levels

learning_goals: Learners can recognize their anxiety levels in stress-inducing situations and classify them into three stages (relaxed-challenge-panic).
Learners can apply two or more strategies to maintain stress levels within the "challenge zone" based on the Yerkes-Dodson Law.
Learners can convert stress encountered while resolving social conflict scenarios in a VR simulation environment (with over 80% success rate) into a learning motivator.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
